meanings.definition: A colorless, flammable liquid hydrocarbon mixture used as a fuel in internal combustion engines.
meanings.sent1: The car engine ran smoothly on benzin.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic filled the tank with benzin.
meanings.sent3: The race car driver accidentally spilled benzin on the track, making it a slippery mess.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like benzin fueling her drive to reach her goals.
meanings.sent5: The smell of benzin lingered in the air, reminding him of the power it held.

meanings.definition: To fill with or use benzin as fuel.
meanings.sent1: He decided to benzin up the lawnmower before starting it.
meanings.sent2: The workers benzin the generator to keep the lights on during the storm.
meanings.sent3: She joked that she could benzin up her bicycle to make it go faster.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to benzin the conversation, igniting a lively debate.
meanings.sent5: The team needed to benzin their motivation to finish the project on time.
